div.p: We gratefully acknowledge all those who made their pollen datasets available in databases for reanalysis in this research, besides the co-authors, pollen data contributors also include Xiangjun Sun, Xiangdong Yang, Huiyou Han, and Annette Kramer. We are thankful to Gerd Müller for discussion on jet stream circulation characteristics. We thank Cathy Jenks and Ed Manning for language editing. We are thankful to the comments from three reviewers. This work was supported by funding from the Federal Ministry of Education and Research (PalMod initiative) and the Helmholtz Association's Impulse and Network fund. T.L. was supported by the Initiative and Networking Fund of the Helmholtz Association Grant VG-NH900 and European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation program (grant agreement no. 716092). Fahu Chen was supported by National Key Research and Development Program of China (#2018YFA0606400). Qinghai Xu was supported by State Key Program of National Natural Science Foundation of China (#41630753); Zhuo Zheng was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (#41230101); Yan Zhao was supported by National Key Research and Development Program of China (#2016YFA0600501) and Strategic Priority Research Program of Chinese Academy of Sciences (#XDA20070101).
